round: #round: round number
reverse: used for fleet spawning and antispam calculations. Meant to start at round 1

round: #reverse: add a swapped player/enemy position for every given match
#battlespace: battlespace type number
#waves: Number of waves in PvE type of tournament
#vsScreen: boolean to display a Players versus intro
#announcer: boolean to have a voiced announcer comment start
#clock: boolean to display a timer
#status: boolean to display a percenteage of remaining ship status
#maxCR: boolean to either set the deployment CR to 100% or clamp it to the max CR of the ship
#noRetreat: boolean to prevent the fleets from retreating
#admiralAI: use the built-in admiral AI (attacks points
#flagshipMode: boolean for a special set of rule allowing one cheaper core ship
#buyInHullmod: boolean for including the hullmods in the fleet cost calculation (only one purchace for the whole round fleet per used hullmod)
#blacklist: boolean to detect otherwise forbidden ships and weapons
#hullBudget: integer of the allowed budget for the ships
#equipementBudget: integer of the allowed budget for the equipement
#maintenance: boolean to use the maintenance cost when keeping a ship instead of buying it every round.
#supplies: integer price of the supplies used for the maintenance cost.
#sharedBudgetPercent: integer percentage of the budget(s) that can be shared between players of a same team
#antispam: boolean to apply price hike to identical deployed hulls past a threshold
#hike: percentage price increase per addiditional hull past the threshold
#fighterT
vsScreen: capitalT: base round one threshold. Set the fighters to 0 or less to ignore

round: #fighterR
announcer: allows bigger fleet in later rounds
